about_the_game:
This DLC contains additional chapters of Cheng Cing Syuan, players can access this story content in the DLC option in the game.

About the story:
Mu Fan and Cheng Cing Syuan, who reunited after four years, enjoyed a happy cohabitation life while making up for the memories that could no longer be found. However, Mu Fan concealed his state of running away from home...

Mu Fan and Cheng Cing Syuan, who met again four years later, had some different changes. Cheng Cing Syuan finally realized his dream of moving out of the house and starting an independent life. As a succubus, Mu Fan felt distressed for Cheng Cing Syuan, who was busy with work, and even worked overtime every day. To this end, Mu Fan would wait for each other to come home from get off work every night, have dinner together to make up for the memories that can no longer be found, and more importantly, enjoy a happy cohabitation life together. Cheng Cing Syuan was also accustomed to Mu Fan's life in the human world and the demon world. And recently, Mu Fan seems to have been in the human world for quite a while. In fact, Mu Fan concealed his state of running away from home...

*This DLC not for English.

content_descriptors.notes: This DLC will feature consensual sexual intercourse between a man and a man.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Monterey 12.1
  • Processor: intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Monterey 12.1
  • Processor: intel i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card

name: Like an Angel～First Bloom～

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows7
  • Processor: intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows10
  • Processor: intel i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
